content: hi my name is avval anish
नमस्कार, माझं नाव अव्वल अनिश आहे.

"what was the last message" in Marathi would be "शेवटचा संदेश काय होता?" However, since you've mentioned to leave technical programming terms in English and not to translate "the," the phrase would remain unchanged as there are no technical programming terms or the word "the" in the phrase.
